Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends Observable<Message>
Class to model the lobby of player. This object contains the game and manage its life and the communications.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby​(java.lang.String lobbyId, int dimension)
      Create a new Lobby object with a give id and a given dimension
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - the unique id of the lobby
      dimension - the minimum and maximum number of player needed to start the game

  • Method Details

    • addClientConnection

      public void addClientConnection​(java.lang.String username, ClientConnection clientConnection)
      Add a new client's connection the lobby if there is enough space.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the new player
      clientConnection - connection of the new player
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is complete

    • removeClientConnection

      public void removeClientConnection​(ClientConnection clientConnection)
      Remove a player from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      clientConnection - connection of the player

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Test if the lobby is full or not.
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is full (number of players equals to the dimension of the lobby); else false

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Test if the lobby is empty or not.
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is empty (number of players equals to 0); else false

    • setGame

      public void setGame​(Game game)

    • setupObservers

      public void setupObservers()
      Setup the observers to get updates from the game (model)

    • setupMVC

      public void setupMVC()
      Setup the components needed to operate according to the MVC paradigm.

    • init

      public void init()
      Launche the initialization phase.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Start a new game.

    • sendBroadcast

      public void sendBroadcast​(java.lang.Object message)
      Send a message to every player in the lobby.

    • sendUnicast

      public void sendUnicast​(java.lang.Object message, java.lang.String player)
      Send a message to a single player of the lobby.
      Parameters:
      message - the object to send
      player - the username of the target player

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(java.lang.String username)
      Test if the lobby contains a player.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to test
      Returns:
      true if the player is contained; else false

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(ClientConnection clientConnection)
      Test if the lobby contains a ClientConnection.
      Parameters:
      clientConnection - the connection to test
      Returns:
      true if the connection is contained; else false
